entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `bool TryGetElementAt<T>(this IEnumerable<T>, out T element)` #110338
  • [wasi] wasi-socket sample fails with single file bundle #110337
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #110328
  • windows/x64: Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Physical promotion' #110326
  • Reconsider deleting `linux-instructions.md` and related files #110324
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient contention due to shared CTS registrations #110323
    Future
  • ApplyCompressionNegotiation build task fails when RCL references a Nuget RCL with StaticWebAssetBasePath set to / #110321
  • IsolatedStorageFile Throws System.UriFormatException #110319
  • [.NET 10] missing Mono and Emscripten manifests for downlevel .NET 9 targeting #110318
  • [Fuzzlyn] JIT: Assertion failed 'IsMultiRegNode()' during 'Head and tail merge' #110316
    10.0.0
  • JIT: IV opts relop evaluation misses combining facts to prove relops #110315
    10.0.0
  • Calling IMetaDataEmit::GetSaveSize invalidates GenericParam and other tokens #110311
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'newLclValue.BothDefined()' during 'Do value numbering' #110306
    10.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Propagate StringSyntaxAttribute #110305
  • [API Proposal]: Path.ContainsInvalidPathChar and Path.ContainsInvalidFileNameChar #110301
  • Expand ILLink/ILC support for 'eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons' to work on internal types too #110300
  • Test failure: Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.cmd #110299
  • Test failure: baseservices/compilerservices/RuntimeHelpers/RuntimeHelpersTests/RuntimeHelpersTests.cmd #110298

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Hope to add this method Pow(BigInteger a, BigInteger b, BigInteger c) #110310
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' during 'Remove empty try' #110317
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect Parameter Order in ArgumentException Constructor in IfNullOrWhitespace Method #110294
  • System.TypeInitializationException in ActivityListener when accessing ActivitySource from a static field #110249
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics failing on native AOT #110240
  • Question : dotnet counters ThreadPool Thread Count and ThreadPool.SetMinThread #110304
  • [API Proposal]: Allow opt-out of automatic disposal in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #109492
  • Test failure: readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.cmd #109500
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/RecursiveException/RecursiveException.cmd #109498
    10.0.0
  • JIT does not elide empty try/catch blocks #107191
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables.Test.EnvironmentVariablesTest.BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #109904
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_DoesNotChangeContentRootIfCurrentDirectoryIsWindowsSystemDirectory #109692
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #110132
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #110180
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • Test Failure: JIT/jit64/opt/cg/cgstress/CgStress1_ro/CgStress1_ro.cmd #110176
    10.0.0
  • WASM build failed to download geckodriver due to network blip #106407
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Suppress IL3050 warnings in ILLink tests #110340
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #110336
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Fix Workflow Broken Markdown Links #110332
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update tests to see if NativeAOT failure is related to other PR #110330
    NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • [cdac] Handle type descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetLoaderModule` #110325
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow AltJit for matched VM to also use otherwise unsupported ISAs #110320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • docs: Update ilc-architecture DependencyGraphViewer link #110314
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid mask<->vector optimization for masks used in unhandled ways #110307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check loaded in dac values to avoid SIGSEGV on null pointers #110303
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #110335
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Update profile data for continuation block of removed call-finally #110327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin the 6.0.x down-level versions to 6.0.36 #110329
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Delete shared ThrowHelper used only a single test #110313
    needs-area-label
  • Rename {CLR,DOTNET}_ICU/OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE #110259
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #109742
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #109566
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Disable GFNI tests for NAOT #110250
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #110341
    needs-area-label
  • Fix Configuration to throw with ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration option #110209
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #110228
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2593673 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #109322
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid an allocation in BigInteger.Parse("-2147483648") #104666
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Provide more info on the failing CustomAttributeProvider #110230
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [RuntimeAsync] Make Async marker a bit in MethodImpl flags #110274
    area-Meta
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110271
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110269
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110268
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Do greedy 4-opt for backward jumps in 3-opt layout #110277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x
